alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Nemaha; Pottawatomie; Riley; Shawnee; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 1:40PM CDT until July 14 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN RILEY...WESTERN SHAWNEE...CENTRAL WABAUNSEE... EASTERN POTTAWATOMIE...SOUTHEASTERN NEMAHA AND WESTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 139 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles west of Soldier to near Emmett to near McFarland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Wamego, Holton, Rossville, Alma, St. Marys, Dover, Silver Lake, Onaga, Maple Hill, McFarland, Paxico, Belvue, Emmett, Louisville, Circleville, Delia, Soldier, Havensville, Willard and Potawatomi Reservation. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 319 and 349. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson; Nemaha; Pottawatomie; Riley; Shawnee; Wabaunsee
